Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தினைத்துணையாங் குற்றம் வரினும் பனைத்துணையாக் கொள்வர் பழிநாணு வார்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Though small as millet-seed the fault men deem; As palm tree vast to those who fear disgrace 'twill seem.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of impeccable character, who fears disgrace ('பழிநாணுவார்'), stands looking at their own hand with a look of deep concern.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On their hand is a tiny, almost invisible speck, like a single grain of millet ('தினைத்துணையாம் குற்றம்'). However, this tiny speck casts a colossal, terrifying shadow on the wall behind them, a shadow the size and shape of a giant palm tree ('பனைத்துணையா').
Layered_Composition.Background: A simple, clean, and well-ordered room, indicating the person's normally faultless nature, which makes the shadow of the tiny fault all the more dramatic.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual representation of how a person who is deeply conscious of honor perceives even the tiniest fault as a monumental failure.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The tiny millet seed vs. the giant palm tree shadow is the central, powerful metaphor. The person's concerned expression shows their deep fear of disgrace.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Conscientious, sensitive to honor, dramatic, introspective.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A single, strong light source is positioned to create the disproportionately large and menacing shadow. The color palette is minimalist, focusing on the person, the speck, and its shadow.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Medium shot that captures the person, their hand with the speck, and the massive shadow on the wall.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with a sharp focus to keep both the speck and the shadow clear.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, dramatic lighting (chiaroscuro) to maximize the impact of the shadow.

Negative_Prompt: person ignoring the fault, small shadow, happy expression, cluttered room, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the shape and texture of the shadow.
